free-mobile-presets.title: Free Mobile Lightroom Presets
free-mobile-presets.desc: Download free mobile Lightroom presets from Presets Galore. Perfect for Instagram, blogging and photo editing on the go. Compatible with iPhone, iPad, iPod and Android phones and tablets. Gorgeously transform your photos with a single click. These Adobe Lightroom presets are fully adjustable giving you complete control over the final result. They are easy to install and even easier to use. The mobile version of Lightroom will automatically sync with Lightroom CC. So, if you have an Adobe Creative Cloud subscription you can use the presets on desktop too.

free-desktop-lightroom-presets.title: Free Desktop Lightroom Presets
free-desktop-lightroom-presets.desc: These free Lightroom presets are compatible with Lightroom 4, 5, 6, 7, Lightroom Classic and Lightroom CC. They are also compatible with Adobe Camera Raw. Compatible with both Mac and PC. Every set comes with easy to follow installation instructions.
